definition: to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize

sentences.english: But Mr Shu says surprises like the one for Ms Zhang are good tests of bureaucratic talent.
sentences.chinese: 但小張認爲這種測試是選拔做官人才的良好方式。

sentences.english: They qualified for the qualifying tourney by their finish in last year's regional tournaments.
sentences.chinese: 他們通過去年的地區選拔賽獲得了落選錦標賽的資格。

sentences.english: Meanwhile selects the male nurse for the hospital to provide the theoretically basis.
sentences.chinese: 同時爲醫院選拔男護士提供理論上的參考。

sentences.english: It is also the quickest and the most effi way to choose the top students.
sentences.chinese: 考試也是選拔好學生唯一的辦法。

sentences.english: How and when will I know if I have passed through the audition?
sentences.chinese: 我要如何知道我已通過選拔賽？

sentences.english: The state lays special stress on training and promoting women cadres.
sentences.chinese: 國家重視培養和選拔婦女幹部。

sentences.english: Did you get a place in the ballot?
sentences.chinese: 你在這場選拔中是否佔有佔有一席之位？

sentences.english: How to Keep Fit A healthy body is very important to every one of us.
sentences.chinese: 招警考試是公務員選拔體系中非常特殊的一類考試。

sentences.english: Of course, the cadres we select should also include those who are around 50.
sentences.chinese: 當然，選拔幹部也要包括五十歲內外的。

sentences.english: A trial game was arranged between possibles and probables.
sentences.chinese: 在可能入選和希望較大選手之間安排了一場選拔賽。

sentences.english: She is selected by the number one pick.
sentences.chinese: 她在隊員選拔時以第一位被選上。

sentences.english: These teams are going to try out for the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 這些隊伍要參加奧林匹克運動會的選拔賽。

sentences.english: NVIDIA World Cup for E-sports contest , the grand FITA round will be adopted.
sentences.chinese: NVIDIA世界盃電子競技大賽，選拔賽是淘汰制。

sentences.english: Moral assessment is difficult to carry out in the process of selecting the Party and Government cadres in China.
sentences.chinese: 品德測評是我國黨政幹部選拔中的難點問題。

sentences.english: Jack gave the tryouts the business but he failed to make the team.
sentences.chinese: 傑克在選拔賽中全力以赴，但他沒有被選進代表隊。

sentences.english: Nor will there be any change to the eligibility standards for military benefits.
sentences.chinese: 以及關乎部隊利益的選拔合格標準也不會改變。

definition: to compete/to take part in a competition
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
